name: ELEX Embed YouTube Video Gallery
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
The ELEX Embed YouTube Video Gallery plugin allows you to embed unlimited YouTube galleries on your website, featuring complete channels, handles, playlists, or single videos. Utilizing the YouTube API, this plugin is designed for optimal performance. It offers features such as pagination to enhance layout and loading speed, automatic synchronization, and various customization options.

Features

  • Create unlimited galleries featuring videos from various YouTube channels, handles, playlists, and videos
  • Automatic gallery syncs with all of your YouTube channels, handles, and playlists
  • Live preview
  • Customizable gallery layout
  • Add an intro video to galleries
  • Include a subscribe button in the gallery
  • Pagination customization
  • Generate gallery-specific shortcodes
  • Light and dark color mode customization
  • Videos can be wrapped in a container for the background of the gallery
  • Ability to revert to default settings

Premium Version Features

For complete list of features and details, Please visit ELEX WordPress Embed YouTube Video Gallery.

  • Play button customization
  • Add product videos to individual product galleries through direct WooCommerce integration/li>
  • Premium support

About ELEXtensions

We, Team ELEXtensions are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores. We offer a wide variety of extensions for WooCommerce. We have premium extensions related to many domains including Shipping, Pricing, Payments and Customer Support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it ! you can now configure the plugin.

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 8.9

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 7.8

  • Bug fixes.

  • Initial push
